AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Federico Saldana: truck driver who was stopped by Deputy Cox, identified himself and stated he was not used to driving a truck with a trailer attached, has a history of arrests including drug smuggling, denied presence of dope during questioning
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston: narcotics investigator who provided traffic violation information to Deputy Cox, gathered information from Saldana during the stop, strongly encouraged Saldana to cooperate and disclose any drugs
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston and Jason Cox: officers involved in the traffic stop and investigation of Saldana, received consent to search the truck and trailer, temporarily detained Saldana due to increasing suspicions of drug trafficking
